page.title: 06DRAMA FESTIVAL
page.content:
{Ballymoney Drama Festival} is one of the oldest and most respected in Ireland,lasting two weeks each year. The winners in the various classes qualify for the{Northern Ireland {Finals.} Clubs from all over the province enter, not only because of the high standard of performance but because of the highly qualified adjudicators who are invited.
The{Town Hall} has always been the venue and the limited number of seats means there is competition for available tickets once the season tickets have been sold. The festival is a social occasion for those who only meet once a year here in the refreshment room during the interval or after the performance.
